subject: College Athletics
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Andrew Volkening made 43 saves, and Derrick Burnett and Jacques Lamoureux scored as Air Force (28-10-2) earned a 2-0 victory against No. 1 seed Michigan (29-12-0) in the first round of the N.C.A.A. hockey East Regional in Bridgeport, Conn. Air Force will face Vermont on Saturday in the regional final.
